description: This layer shows the distribution of Coastal Recreation values in the NMC region  in million USD per year.  Data used to derive this product was derived from the study "Understanding and Valuing the Marine Ecosystem Services of the Northern Mozambique Channel " by Paulo A.L.D. Nunes and Andrea Ghermandi. This study aimed to understand and value the coastal and marine ecosystem services in the Northern Mozambique Channel region (NMC).
keywords: coastal recreation, ecosystem service, Africa, East Africa, Comoros, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, United Republic of Tanzania
name: Distribution of Coastal Recreation values in the NMC region
